name: rtn3-cell-display-boxid
description: 무오더 반품 로케이션에 매핑한 공박스를 표시할 번호
serviceLogic:
def displayBoxId = (boxId.length() >= 3) ? boxId.substring(boxId.length() - 3, boxId.length()) : boxId;
return displayBoxId;

name: rtn2_scantype_finder
description: 반품 화면에서 스캔한 정보가 어떤 유형의 바코드 인지 체크

name: rtn2-check-loc-mapping-boxid
description: 반품 로케이션 매핑할 박스 ID 체크
serviceLogic:
def valid = (boxId != null && boxId.length() == 16) ? true : false;
return valid;

name: rtn2-cell-display-boxid
description: 반품 2차 분류 로케이션에 매핑한 공박스를 표시할 번호
serviceLogic:
def displayBoxId = (boxId.length() >= 3) ? boxId.substring(boxId.length() - 3, boxId.length()) : boxId;
return displayBoxId;

name: dps2-check-loc-mapping-boxid
description: B2C 로케이션에 매핑할 박스 ID 체크
serviceLogic:
def valid = (boxId == null || (!boxId.startsWith('A PMC') && !boxId.startsWith('ALEVC') && !boxId.startsWith('A MEC')) || boxId.length() != 16) ? false : true;
return valid;

name: dps2-cell-display-boxid
description: DPS 2차 분류 로케이션에 매핑한 공박스를 표시할 번호

name: after-receive-order-by-batch
description: 주문 정보를 수신한 후 액션 처리
serviceLogic:
import com.cj.mps3.entity.JobOrder;
import java.util.HashMap;

def sql = """
	update 
		tb_if_order o
	set 
		o.order_group = nvl2(o.order_group, decode(o.order_group, 'UNKNOWN', o.pass_stop_cd, o.vehicle_no), decode(o.vehicle_no, 'UNKNOWN', o.pass_stop_cd, o.vehicle_no))
		, o.pack_type = (
				select 
					lbl_val1 
                 from 
                	tb_if_order_label
                 where   
                	if_order_id = o.id)
	where
		o.domain_id = ${domainId}
		and o.batch_id = '${batchId}'
"""

queryDsl.init('com.cj.mps3.entity.JobOrder');
return queryDsl.executeSql(sql.toString(), new HashMap());

name: wcs_minutely_result
description: WCS 10분대별 실적
serviceLogic:
SELECT
	A.MINUTES,
	A.RESULT_QTY
FROM (
	SELECT
		JOB_HOUR AS HOUR,
		JOB_HOUR || ':00' AS MINUTES,
		COALESCE(SUM(M10_RESULT), 0) AS RESULT_QTY
	FROM
		PRODUCTIVITY
	WHERE
		DOMAIN_ID = :domain_id
		#if($job_date)
		AND JOB_DATE >= :job_date
		#end
		#if($area_cd)
		AND AREA_CD = :area_cd
		#end
		#if($stage_cd)
		AND STAGE_CD = :stage_cd
		#end
		#if($equip_type)
		AND EQUIP_TYPE = :equip_type
		#end
		#if($equip_cd)
		AND EQUIP_CD = :equip_cd
		#end
		#if($job_type)
		AND JOB_TYPE = :job_type
		#end
		#if($attr01)
		AND ATTR01 = :attr01
		#end
		#if($attr02)
		AND ATTR02 = :attr02
		#end
		#if($station_cd)
		AND STATION_CD = :station_cd
		#end
	GROUP BY
    	JOB_HOUR
    	
	UNION ALL
	
	SELECT
		JOB_HOUR AS HOUR,
		JOB_HOUR || ':10' AS MINUTES,
		COALESCE(SUM(M20_RESULT), 0) AS RESULT_QTY
	FROM
		PRODUCTIVITY
	WHERE
		DOMAIN_ID = :domain_id
		#if($job_date)
		AND JOB_DATE >= :job_date
		#end
		#if($area_cd)
		AND AREA_CD = :area_cd
		#end
		#if($stage_cd)
		AND STAGE_CD = :stage_cd
		#end
		#if($equip_type)
		AND EQUIP_TYPE = :equip_type
		#end
		#if($equip_cd)
		AND EQUIP_CD = :equip_cd
		#end
		#if($job_type)
		AND JOB_TYPE = :job_type
		#end
		#if($attr01)
		AND ATTR01 = :attr01
		#end
		#if($attr02)
		AND ATTR02 = :attr02
		#end
		#if($station_cd)
		AND STATION_CD = :station_cd
		#end
	GROUP BY
    	JOB_HOUR
    	
	UNION ALL
	
	SELECT
		JOB_HOUR AS HOUR,
		JOB_HOUR || ':20' AS MINUTES,
		COALESCE(SUM(M30_RESULT), 0) AS RESULT_QTY
	FROM
		PRODUCTIVITY
	WHERE
		DOMAIN_ID = :domain_id
		#if($job_date)
		AND JOB_DATE >= :job_date
		#end
		#if($area_cd)
		AND AREA_CD = :area_cd
		#end
		#if($stage_cd)
		AND STAGE_CD = :stage_cd
		#end
		#if($equip_type)
		AND EQUIP_TYPE = :equip_type
		#end
		#if($equip_cd)
		AND EQUIP_CD = :equip_cd
		#end
		#if($job_type)
		AND JOB_TYPE = :job_type
		#end
		#if($attr01)
		AND ATTR01 = :attr01
		#end
		#if($attr02)
		AND ATTR02 = :attr02
		#end
		#if($station_cd)
		AND STATION_CD = :station_cd
		#end
	GROUP BY
    	JOB_HOUR
    	
	UNION ALL
	
	SELECT
		JOB_HOUR AS HOUR,
		JOB_HOUR || ':30' AS MINUTES,
		COALESCE(SUM(M40_RESULT), 0) AS RESULT_QTY
	FROM
		PRODUCTIVITY
	WHERE
		DOMAIN_ID = :domain_id
		#if($job_date)
		AND JOB_DATE >= :job_date
		#end
		#if($area_cd)
		AND AREA_CD = :area_cd
		#end
		#if($stage_cd)
		AND STAGE_CD = :stage_cd
		#end
		#if($equip_type)
		AND EQUIP_TYPE = :equip_type
		#end
		#if($equip_cd)
		AND EQUIP_CD = :equip_cd
		#end
		#if($job_type)
		AND JOB_TYPE = :job_type
		#end
		#if($attr01)
		AND ATTR01 = :attr01
		#end
		#if($attr02)
		AND ATTR02 = :attr02
		#end
		#if($station_cd)
		AND STATION_CD = :station_cd
		#end
	GROUP BY
    	JOB_HOUR
    	
    	
	UNION ALL
	
	SELECT
		JOB_HOUR AS HOUR,
		JOB_HOUR || ':40' AS MINUTES,
		COALESCE(SUM(M50_RESULT), 0) AS RESULT_QTY
	FROM
		PRODUCTIVITY
	WHERE
		DOMAIN_ID = :domain_id
		#if($job_date)
		AND JOB_DATE >= :job_date
		#end
		#if($area_cd)
		AND AREA_CD = :area_cd
		#end
		#if($stage_cd)
		AND STAGE_CD = :stage_cd
		#end
		#if($equip_type)
		AND EQUIP_TYPE = :equip_type
		#end
		#if($equip_cd)
		AND EQUIP_CD = :equip_cd
		#end
		#if($job_type)
		AND JOB_TYPE = :job_type
		#end
		#if($attr01)
		AND ATTR01 = :attr01
		#end
		#if($attr02)
		AND ATTR02 = :attr02
		#end
		#if($station_cd)
		AND STATION_CD = :station_cd
		#end
	GROUP BY
    	JOB_HOUR
    	
	UNION ALL
	
	SELECT
		JOB_HOUR AS HOUR,
		JOB_HOUR || ':50' AS MINUTES,
		COALESCE(SUM(M60_RESULT), 0) AS RESULT_QTY
	FROM
		PRODUCTIVITY
	WHERE
		DOMAIN_ID = :domain_id
		#if($job_date)
		AND JOB_DATE >= :job_date
		#end
		#if($area_cd)
		AND AREA_CD = :area_cd
		#end
		#if($stage_cd)
		AND STAGE_CD = :stage_cd
		#end
		#if($equip_type)
		AND EQUIP_TYPE = :equip_type
		#end
		#if($equip_cd)
		AND EQUIP_CD = :equip_cd
		#end
		#if($job_type)
		AND JOB_TYPE = :job_type
		#end
		#if($attr01)
		AND ATTR01 = :attr01
		#end
		#if($attr02)
		AND ATTR02 = :attr02
		#end
		#if($station_cd)
		AND STATION_CD = :station_cd
		#end
	GROUP BY
    	JOB_HOUR
) A 
ORDER BY
	A.MINUTES ASC

name: wcs_monthly_result
description: WCS 월별 실적
serviceLogic:
SELECT 	
    YEAR || '-' || MONTH AS MONTH, 
    SUM(PLAN_QTY) AS PLAN_QTY,
    SUM(RESULT_QTY) AS RESULT_QTY
FROM 
    DAILY_PROD_SUMMARY
WHERE 
	DOMAIN_ID = :domain_id
	#if($fromDate)
	AND JOB_DATE >= :fromDate
	#end
	#if($toDate)
	AND JOB_DATE <= :toDate
	#end
	#if($area_cd)
	AND AREA_CD = :area_cd
	#end
	#if($stage_cd)
	AND STAGE_CD = :stage_cd
	#end
	#if($equip_type)
	AND EQUIP_TYPE = :equip_type
	#end
	#if($equip_cd)
	AND EQUIP_CD = :equip_cd
	#end
	#if($job_type)
	AND JOB_TYPE = :job_type
	#end
	#if($attr01)
	AND ATTR01 = :attr01
	#end
	#if($attr02)
	AND ATTR02 = :attr02
	#end
	#if($station_cd)
	AND STATION_CD = :station_cd
	#end
GROUP BY
    YEAR, MONTH
ORDER BY
    YEAR, MONTH

name: wcs_job_status
description: WCS 작업 진행 현황

name: wcs_hourly_result
description: WCS 시간대별 실적
serviceLogic:
SELECT
		JOB_HOUR AS HOUR, 
		COALESCE(SUM(M10_RESULT), 0) + COALESCE(SUM(M20_RESULT), 0) + COALESCE(SUM(M30_RESULT), 0) + COALESCE(SUM(M40_RESULT), 0) + COALESCE(SUM(M50_RESULT), 0)  + COALESCE(SUM(M60_RESULT), 0) AS RESULT_QTY
	FROM
		PRODUCTIVITY
	WHERE
		DOMAIN_ID = :domain_id
		#if($job_date)
		AND JOB_DATE >= :job_date
		#end
		#if($area_cd)
		AND AREA_CD = :area_cd
		#end
		#if($stage_cd)
		AND STAGE_CD = :stage_cd
		#end
		#if($equip_type)
		AND EQUIP_TYPE = :equip_type
		#end
		#if($equip_cd)
		AND EQUIP_CD = :equip_cd
		#end
		#if($job_type)
		AND JOB_TYPE = :job_type
		#end
		#if($attr01)
		AND ATTR01 = :attr01
		#end
		#if($attr02)
		AND ATTR02 = :attr02
		#end
		#if($station_cd)
		AND STATION_CD = :station_cd
		#end
	GROUP BY
		JOB_HOUR
	ORDER BY
		JOB_HOUR ASC

name: wcs_daily_result
description: WCS 일별 실적
serviceLogic:
SELECT 	
    JOB_DATE,
    SUM(PLAN_QTY) AS PLAN_QTY,
    SUM(RESULT_QTY) AS RESULT_QTY
FROM 
    DAILY_PROD_SUMMARY
WHERE 
	DOMAIN_ID = :domain_id
	#if($fromDate)
	AND JOB_DATE >= :fromDate
	#end
	#if($toDate)
	AND JOB_DATE <= :toDate
	#end
	#if($area_cd)
	AND AREA_CD = :area_cd
	#end
	#if($stage_cd)
	AND STAGE_CD = :stage_cd
	#end
	#if($equip_type)
	AND EQUIP_TYPE = :equip_type
	#end
	#if($equip_cd)
	AND EQUIP_CD = :equip_cd
	#end
	#if($job_type)
	AND JOB_TYPE = :job_type
	#end
	#if($attr01)
	AND ATTR01 = :attr01
	#end
	#if($attr02)
	AND ATTR02 = :attr02
	#end
	#if($station_cd)
	AND STATION_CD = :station_cd
	#end
GROUP BY
    JOB_DATE
ORDER BY
    JOB_DATE

name: rtn-picked-by-location
description: 반품 로케이션별 확정 수량
serviceLogic:
SELECT   proc.job_date,
         reg.stage_cd,
         proc.equip_type, 
         proc.equip_cd,
         reg.rack_nm AS equip_nm, 
         proc.sub_equip_cd,
         loc.ind_cd,
         SUM(proc.pick_qty) AS pick_qty,
         SUM(proc.picked_qty) AS picked_qty
from
    job_instances proc
    inner join cells loc on proc.domain_id = loc.domain_id and proc.sub_equip_cd = loc.cell_cd
    inner join racks reg on proc.domain_id = loc.domain_id and reg.rack_cd = loc.equip_cd
where
	proc.domain_id = :domain_id
	and proc.job_type = 'RTN'
	#if($job_date)
	and proc.job_date = :job_date
	#else
	and proc.batch_id in (select id from job_batches where domain_id = :domain_id and job_type = 'RTN' and status = 'RUN')
	#end
	#if($rack_cd)
	and reg.rack_cd = :rack_cd
	#end
group by proc.job_date, reg.stage_cd, proc.equip_type, proc.equip_cd, reg.rack_nm, proc.sub_equip_cd, loc.ind_cd
order by proc.sub_equip_cd

name: not_input_list
description: 주문 및 작업 > 미투입 리스트
serviceLogic:
SELECT
	BATCH_ID, REGION_CD, REGION_NM, JOB_DATE, JOB_BATCH_SEQ, DC_CD, COM_CD, 
	SKU_CD, SKU_NM, BOX_IN_QTY, SUM(PICK_QTY) AS PICK_QTY, 
	SUM(PICKING_QTY) AS PICKING_QTY, SUM(PICKED_QTY) AS PICKED_QTY, STATUS
FROM
	TB_PROCESS
WHERE
	DOMAIN_ID = :domain_id
	#if($job_date)
	AND JOB_DATE = :job_date
	#end
	#if($job_batch_seq)
	AND JOB_BATCH_SEQ = :job_batch_seq
	#end
	#if($dc_cd)
	AND DC_CD = :dc_cd
	#end
	#if($batch_id)
	AND BATCH_ID = :batch_id
	#end
	#if($region_cd)
	AND REGION_CD = :region_cd
	#end
	#if($sku_cd)
	AND SKU_CD LIKE '%' || :sku_cd || '%'
	#end
	#if($sku_nm)
	AND SKU_NM LIKE '%' || :sku_nm || '%'
	#end
	#if($cancel == 'true')
	AND STATUS = 'C'
	#elseif($cancel == 'false')
	AND STATUS = 'W'
	#else
	AND STATUS IN ('C', 'W')
	#end
GROUP BY
	BATCH_ID, REGION_CD, REGION_NM, JOB_DATE, JOB_BATCH_SEQ, DC_CD, COM_CD, SKU_CD, SKU_NM, BOX_IN_QTY, STATUS
ORDER BY
	JOB_DATE, JOB_BATCH_SEQ, DC_CD, REGION_CD, COM_CD, SKU_CD ASC

name: locations_by_vehicle
description: 주문 및 작업 > 차량별 로케이션
serviceLogic:
SELECT
	DISTINCT O.BATCH_ID, O.JOB_DATE, O.JOB_BATCH_SEQ, O.DC_CD, O.COM_CD, O.CUST_CD, O.CUST_NM,
	O.REGION_CD, P.REGION_NM, P.LOC_CD, O.VEHICLE_NO, O.PACK_TYPE
FROM
	TB_IF_ORDER O 
	INNER JOIN
	TB_PROCESS P
	ON O.DOMAIN_ID = P.DOMAIN_ID AND O.BATCH_ID = P.BATCH_ID AND O.COM_CD = P.COM_CD AND O.CUST_CD = P.CUST_CD
WHERE
	O.DOMAIN_ID = :domain_id
	AND O.JOB_DATE = :job_date
	AND O.JOB_BATCH_SEQ = :job_batch_seq
	AND O.DC_CD = :dc_cd
	#if($batch_id)
	AND O.BATCH_ID = :batch_id
	#end	
	#if($region_cd)
	AND O.REGION_CD = :region_cd
	#end
	#if($loc_cd)
	AND P.LOC_CD like :loc_cd
	#end	
	#if($cust_nm)
	AND O.CUST_NM like '%' || :cust_nm || '%'
	#end
	#if($vehicle_no)
	AND O.VEHICLE_NO like '%' || :vehicle_no || '%'
	#end
	#if($pack_type)
	AND O.PACK_TYPE = :pack_type
	#end
ORDER BY
	P.LOC_CD ASC

name: job-result-detail
description: 주문 및 작업 > 박스 작업 내역 상세
serviceLogic:
SELECT
	a.sku_cd,
	a.sku_nm,
	a.sku_barcd,
	a.plan_qty, 
	a.actual_qty, 
	(a.plan_qty - a.actual_qty) as left_qty
FROM
	(SELECT
		p.sku_cd, 
		p.sku_nm,
		s.sku_barcd,
		sum(p.pick_qty) as plan_qty, 
		nvl(sum(p.real_picked_qty), 0) as actual_qty
	FROM
		TB_PROCESS p left outer join TB_SKU s on p.com_cd = s.com_cd and p.sku_cd = s.sku_cd
	WHERE
		p.domain_id = :domain_id
		and p.job_date = :job_date
		and p.job_batch_seq = :job_batch_seq
		and p.bucket_cd = :invoice_id
	GROUP BY
		p.sku_cd, p.sku_nm, s.sku_barcd
	ORDER BY
		p.sku_cd) a

name: job-result
description: 주문 및 작업 > 박스 작업 내역
serviceLogic:
select 
  distinct job_date, job_batch_seq, dc_cd, com_cd, cust_cd, cust_nm, box_id as invoice_id, box_sku_cnt as sku_qty, box_qty, status, to_char(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as created_at, sum(picked_qty) as actual_qty
from (
  SELECT
    B.job_date,
    B.job_batch_seq,
    B.dc_cd,
    B.com_cd,
    B.cust_cd,
    B.cust_nm,
    B.box_id,
    B.box_sku_cnt,
    B.box_seq as box_qty,
    B.status,
    B.created_at,
    D.picked_qty
  FROM
    TB_IF_BOX_RESULT B inner join TB_IF_BOX_DETAIL D
    on B.id = D.box_result_id
  WHERE
    B.domain_id = :domain_id
	#if($dc_cd)
	and B.dc_cd = :dc_cd
	#end
	#if($com_cd)
	and B.com_cd = :com_cd
	#end  
	#if($job_date)
	and B.job_date = :job_date
	#end	
	#if($job_batch_seq)
	and B.job_batch_seq = :job_batch_seq
	#end	
	#if($cust_cd)
	and B.cust_cd = :cust_cd
	#end
	#if($box_id)
	and B.box_id = :box_id
	#end      
)
group by
  job_date, job_batch_seq, dc_cd, com_cd, cust_cd, cust_nm, box_id, box_sku_cnt, box_qty, status, created_at
order by
  created_at desc

name: das-result-by-sku-summary
description: 주문 및 작업 > DAS 상품 내역 > 서머리
serviceLogic:
SELECT
	dc_cd, com_cd, cust_qty, plan_qty, actual_qty, (plan_qty - actual_qty) as left_qty
FROM
	(SELECT
		dc_cd, com_cd, count(distinct(cust_cd)) as cust_qty, sum(pick_qty) as plan_qty, nvl(sum(real_picked_qty), 0) as actual_qty
	FROM
		TB_PROCESS
	WHERE
		domain_id = :domain_id
		and job_type = 'DAS'
		and job_date = :job_date
		and job_batch_seq = :job_batch_seq
		#if($sku_cd)
			and sku_cd = :sku_cd
		#end
	GROUP BY
		dc_cd, com_cd)

name: das-result-by-sku-detail
description: 주문 및 작업 > DAS 상품 내역 > 상세
serviceLogic:
SELECT
	:job_date as job_date, 
	:job_batch_seq as job_batch_seq, 
	a.sku_cd, 
	a.cust_cd,
	a.cust_nm,
	a.plan_qty, 
	a.actual_qty, 
	(a.plan_qty - a.actual_qty) as left_qty, 
	decode((a.plan_qty - a.actual_qty), 0, '작업완료', '작업중') as status
FROM
	(SELECT
		sku_cd, cust_cd, cust_nm, sum(pick_qty) as plan_qty, nvl(sum(real_picked_qty), 0) as actual_qty
	FROM
		TB_PROCESS
	WHERE
		domain_id = :domain_id
		and job_type = 'DAS'
		and job_date = :job_date
		and job_batch_seq = :job_batch_seq
		and com_cd = :com_cd
		and sku_cd = :sku_cd
	GROUP BY
		sku_cd, cust_cd, cust_nm
	ORDER BY
		cust_cd) a

name: das-result-by-sku
description: 주문 및 작업 > DAS 상품 내역
serviceLogic:
SELECT
	:job_date as job_date,
	:job_batch_seq as job_batch_seq,
	a.com_cd,
	a.sku_cd,
	a.sku_nm,
	a.sku_barcd,
	a.cust_qty,
	a.plan_qty,
	a.actual_qty,
	(a.plan_qty - a.actual_qty) as left_qty,
	decode((a.plan_qty - a.actual_qty), 0, :finished, :unfinished) as status
FROM
	(SELECT
		com_cd, sku_cd, sku_barcd, max(sku_nm) as sku_nm, count(distinct(cust_cd)) as cust_qty, sum(order_qty) as plan_qty, nvl(sum(picked_qty), 0) as actual_qty
	FROM
		TB_IF_ORDER
	WHERE
		domain_id = :domain_id
		#if($com_cd)
		and com_cd = :com_cd
		#end
		#if($dc_cd)
		and dc_cd = :dc_cd
		#end
		#if($job_date)
		and job_date = :job_date
		#end
		#if($job_batch_seq)
		and job_batch_seq = :job_batch_seq
		#end
		#if($sku_cd)
		and sku_cd = :sku_cd
		#end
	GROUP BY
		com_cd, sku_cd, sku_barcd, sku_nm
	ORDER BY
		com_cd, sku_cd) a

name: das-out-result-summary
description: 주문 및 작업 > DAS 출고 내역 > 서머리
serviceLogic:
SELECT
	dc_cd,
	com_cd,
	cust_qty, 
	sku_qty, 
	plan_qty, 
	actual_qty, 
	(plan_qty - actual_qty) as left_qty, box_qty
FROM
	(SELECT
		dc_cd,
		com_cd,
		count(distinct(cust_cd)) as cust_qty, 
		count(distinct(sku_cd)) as sku_qty, 
		sum(pick_qty) as plan_qty, 
		nvl(sum(real_picked_qty), 0) as actual_qty, 
		nvl(count(distinct(box_result_id)), 0) as box_qty
	FROM
		TB_PROCESS
	WHERE
		domain_id = :domain_id
		and job_type = 'DAS'
		#if($dc_cd)
		and dc_cd = :dc_cd
		#end
		#if($com_cd)
		and com_cd = :com_cd
		#end		
		and job_date = :job_date
		and job_batch_seq = :job_batch_seq
		#if($region_cd)
		and region_cd = :region_cd
		#end		
		#if($cust_cd)
		and cust_cd = :cust_cd
		#end
	GROUP BY
		dc_cd, com_cd)

name: das-out-result-box-sku-detail
description: 주문 및 작업 > DAS 출고 내역 > 상세 > 상세
serviceLogic:
SELECT 
		b.id,
		b.sku_cd,
		b.sku_nm,
		s.sku_barcd,
		b.pick_qty,
		b.picked_qty
	FROM
		TB_IF_BOX_DETAIL b
		left outer join
		TB_SKU s
		on b.sku_cd = s.sku_cd
	WHERE
		BOX_RESULT_ID = :box_result_id
	ORDER BY
		b.sku_cd asc

name: das-out-result-box-detail
description: 주문 및 작업 > DAS 출고 내역 > 상세
serviceLogic:
SELECT 
		id as box_result_id,
		region_cd,
		cust_cd, 
		cust_nm,
		invoice_id,
		box_seq,
		picked_qty as actual_qty,
		status
	FROM
		TB_IF_BOX_RESULT
	WHERE
		ID in (
			SELECT
				box_result_id
			FROM
				TB_PROCESS
			WHERE
				domain_id = :domain_id
				and job_type = 'DAS'
				and job_date = :job_date
				and job_batch_seq = :job_batch_seq
				and cust_cd = :cust_cd
			)
	ORDER BY
		box_seq desc

name: das-out-result
description: 주문 및 작업 > DAS 출고 내역
serviceLogic:
SELECT
	:job_date as job_date,
	:job_batch_seq as job_batch_seq,
	a.dc_cd,
	a.com_cd,
	a.cust_cd,
	a.cust_nm,
	a.cust_qty,
	a.sku_qty,
	a.plan_qty,
	a.actual_qty,
	a.box_qty,
	(a.plan_qty - a.actual_qty) as left_qty,
	decode((a.plan_qty - a.actual_qty), 0, :finished, :unfinished) as status
FROM
	(SELECT
		dc_cd,
		com_cd,
		cust_cd,
		cust_nm,
		count(distinct(cust_cd)) as cust_qty,
		count(distinct(sku_cd)) as sku_qty,
		sum(pick_qty) as plan_qty,
		nvl(sum(real_picked_qty), 0) as actual_qty,
		count(distinct(box_result_id)) as box_qty
	FROM
		TB_PROCESS
	WHERE
		domain_id = :domain_id
		#if($com_cd)
		and com_cd = :com_cd
		#end
		#if($dc_cd)
		and dc_cd = :dc_cd
		#end	
		and job_type = 'DAS'
		and job_date = :job_date
		and job_batch_seq = :job_batch_seq
		#if($cust_cd)
		and cust_cd = :cust_cd
		#end
	GROUP BY
		dc_cd, com_cd, cust_cd, cust_nm
	ORDER BY
		dc_cd, com_cd, cust_cd) a

name: fnf-stock-needs
description: FNF용 DPS 재고 필요 수량 리스트
serviceLogic:
select
	stock.*
from (
	select
		s.equip_type,
		s.equip_cd,
		s.sku_cd,
		s.sku_nm,
		s.order_qty,
		s.alloc_qty,
		s.picked_qty,
		s.stock_qty,
		case 
			when (s.order_qty - s.alloc_qty - s.stock_qty) < 0 then 0
			else s.order_qty - s.alloc_qty - s.stock_qty
		end as need_stock_qty
	from (
		select
			a.equip_type,
			a.equip_cd,
			a.sku_cd,
			a.sku_nm,
			COALESCE(a.order_qty, 0) as order_qty,
			COALESCE(a.picked_qty, 0) as picked_qty,
			COALESCE(a.alloc_qty, 0) as alloc_qty,
			COALESCE(b.stock_qty, 0) as stock_qty
		from
			(with fnf_orders as (
				select
					h.equip_type,
					h.equip_cd,
					d.item_cd as sku_cd,
					d.item_nm as sku_nm,
					d.pick_qty,
					d.cmpt_qty,
					case when d.dps_assign_yn = 'Y' then d.pick_qty 
						 else 0 end as alloc_qty
				from
					job_batches h inner join mhe_dr d on h.id = d.work_unit
				where
					h.domain_id = 1
					and h.job_type = 'DPS'
					and h.status = 'RUN'
					#if($equip_type)
					and equip_type = :equip_type
					#end
					#if($equip_cd)
					and equip_cd = :equip_cd
					#end
					#if($sku_cd)
					and d.item_cd like '%' || :sku_cd || '%'
					#end
				) select
					equip_type, equip_cd, sku_cd, sku_nm, 
					COALESCE(sum(pick_qty), 0) as order_qty, COALESCE(sum(cmpt_qty), 0) as picked_qty, COALESCE(sum(alloc_qty), 0) as alloc_qty
				from
					fnf_orders
				group by
					equip_type, equip_cd, sku_cd, sku_nm				
			) a

			left outer join
			
			(select 
				i.equip_type, i.equip_cd, i.sku_cd, i.stock_qty 
			from (
				select
					equip_type, equip_cd, sku_cd,
					COALESCE(sum(load_qty), 0) as stock_qty
				from
					stocks
				where 
					domain_id = :domain_id
					#if($equip_type)
					and equip_type = :equip_type
					#end
					#if($equip_cd)
					and equip_cd = :equip_cd
					#end
					#if($sku_cd)
					and sku_cd like '%'||:sku_cd||'%'
					#end
				group by
					equip_type, equip_cd, sku_cd
			) i 
			where
				i.stock_qty > 0) b

			on a.equip_type = b.equip_type and a.equip_cd = b.equip_cd and a.sku_cd = b.sku_cd
	) s
) stock
order by
	stock.equip_type,
	stock.equip_cd,
	stock.need_stock_qty desc,
	stock.order_qty desc,
	stock.sku_cd

name: fnf-box-inputs
description: FNF DPS 박스 투입
serviceLogic:
select
		h.id as batch_id,
		h.job_date as job_date,
        h.equip_type, 
        h.equip_cd,
        d.box_input_seq as input_seq,
        d.ref_no as order_no,
        d.box_no as box_id,
		d.status,
		max(d.box_input_at) as created_at
    from
    	job_batches h inner join mhe_dr d on h.id = d.work_unit
    where
    	h.domain_id = :domain_id
        and h.job_type = 'DPS'
        and h.status in ('RUN', 'END')
        and (d.box_input_seq is not null and d.box_input_seq > 0)
    	#if($batch_id)
    	and h.id = :batch_id
    	#end
    	#if($job_date)
    	and h.job_date = :job_date
    	#end
    	#if($order_no)
    	and d.ref_no = :order_no
    	#end
    	#if($box_id)
    	and d.box_no = :box_id
    	#end
    	#if($status)
    	and d.status = :status
    	#end
    group by
        h.id, h.job_date, h.equip_type, h.equip_cd, d.box_input_seq, d.ref_no, d.box_no, d.status
    order by
    	h.job_date desc, h.id, d.box_input_seq desc

name: print-box-label
description: 박스 라벨 인쇄

name: qps-one-sku-exem-stock-needs
description: QPS 배치 oneSKU 제외한 재고 리스트
serviceLogic:
select need.batch_id, need.sku_cd,need.sku_barcd,need.sku_nm,need.stock_qty,need.pick_qty,need.picked_qty,need.need_stock_qty,
    case when onesku.order_qty is null  then 0 else onesku.order_qty end as order_qty,
     case when onesku.order_qty is null  then need.need_stock_qty-0 else need.need_stock_qty-onesku.order_qty end as one_sku_need
     from (
        select 
            job_batch_seq, batch_id,  sku_cd, sku_barcd, sku_nm, stock_qty, pick_qty, picked_qty, 
            case when (order_qty - pick_qty - stock_qty) < 0 then 0 else order_qty - pick_qty - stock_qty end as need_stock_qty 
        from (
            select 
                a.job_batch_seq, a.batch_id, a.sku_cd,a.sku_barcd, a.sku_nm, a.order_qty, 
                COALESCE(b.stock_qty,0) as stock_qty, 
                COALESCE(c.pick_qty,0) as pick_qty, 
                COALESCE(c.picked_qty,0) as picked_qty
            from 
                (select
                    job_batch_seq, batch_id,  ts.sku_cd, ts.sku_barcd,ts.sku_nm, COALESCE(sum(pick_qty), 0) as order_qty
                from
                    tb_interface, tb_sku ts
                where
                    domain_id = 99
                    and batch_id = (select id from tb_job_batch where status = 'RUN')
                    and job_type in ('DPS', 'QPS')
                    and region_cd != '05'
                    and ts.sku_cd = tb_interface.sku_cd
                    and ts.com_cd = tb_interface.com_cd
                group by
                    job_batch_seq, batch_id,  ts.sku_cd, ts.sku_barcd, ts.sku_nm) a
                    
                left outer join 
                
                (select  sku_cd, stock_qty from (
                    select
                        sku_cd, COALESCE(sum(load_qty), 0) as stock_qty
                    from
                        tb_stock
                    where 
                        region_cd in (select region_cd from tb_region where job_type in ('DPS', 'QPS') and region_type <> '05')
                    group by
                        sku_cd
                ) where
                    stock_qty > 0) b
                    
                on a.sku_cd = b.sku_cd
                
                left outer join
                
                (select
                    job_batch_seq, batch_id,  ts.sku_cd, ts.sku_nm, 
                    COALESCE(sum(pick_qty), 0) as pick_qty, 
                    COALESCE(sum(real_picked_qty), 0) as picked_qty
                from
                    tb_process p, tb_sku ts
                where
                    domain_id = 99
                    and batch_id = (select id from tb_job_batch where status = 'RUN')
                    and job_type in ('DPS', 'QPS')
                    and region_cd != '05'
                    and ts.sku_cd = p.sku_cd
                    and ts.com_cd = p.com_cd
                    
                group by
                    job_batch_seq, batch_id,  ts.sku_cd, ts.sku_nm) c
                    
                on a.sku_cd = c.sku_cd
        )
    ) need
    left outer join
    (
        select os.sku_cd sku_cd, os.order_qty order_qty,os.status
            from tb_qps_one_sku_order os 
        where os.status <>'END'
    ) onesku
    on need.sku_cd = onesku.sku_cd
    
     order by 
        need.need_stock_qty desc

name: stock-needs
description: DPS 배치 실행을 위한 필요 재고 리스트
serviceLogic:
select stock.* from (
	select 
	    s.equip_type, s.equip_cd, s.sku_cd, s.sku_nm, s.order_qty, s.alloc_qty, s.picked_qty, s.stock_qty, 
	    case when (s.order_qty - s.alloc_qty - s.stock_qty) < 0 then 0 else s.order_qty - s.alloc_qty - s.stock_qty end as need_stock_qty 
	from (
	    select 
	        a.equip_type, a.equip_cd, a.sku_cd, a.sku_nm, 
	        c.order_qty,
	        COALESCE(a.pick_qty, 0) as alloc_qty,
	        COALESCE(a.picked_qty, 0) as picked_qty,
	        COALESCE(b.stock_qty, 0) as stock_qty
	    from
	        (select
	            j.equip_type, j.equip_cd, j.sku_cd, j.sku_nm, 
	            COALESCE(sum(j.pick_qty), 0) as pick_qty, 
	            COALESCE(sum(j.picked_qty), 0) as picked_qty
	        from
	            job_instances j inner join job_batches b on j.batch_id = b.id
	        where
	            j.domain_id = :domain_id
	            and b.job_type = 'DPS'
	            and b.status = 'RUN'
	            and j.order_type = 'MT'
		        #if($equip_type)
		        and j.equip_type = :equip_type
		        #end
		        #if($equip_cd)
		        and j.equip_cd = :equip_cd
		        #end
		        #if($sku_cd)
		        and j.sku_cd like '%'||:sku_cd||'%'
		        #end
	        group by
	            j.equip_type, j.equip_cd, j.sku_cd, j.sku_nm) a

	        left outer join 
	        
	        (select i.equip_type, i.equip_cd, i.sku_cd, i.stock_qty from (
	            select
	                 equip_type, equip_cd, sku_cd, sum(load_qty) as stock_qty
	            from
	                stocks
	            where 
	                domain_id = :domain_id
			        #if($equip_type)
			        and equip_type = :equip_type
			        #end
			        #if($equip_cd)
			        and equip_cd = :equip_cd
			        #end
			        #if($sku_cd)
			        and sku_cd like '%'||:sku_cd||'%'
			        #end
	            group by
	                equip_type, equip_cd, sku_cd
	        ) i 
	        where
	          i.stock_qty > 0) b
	            
	        on a.equip_type = b.equip_type and a.equip_cd = b.equip_cd and a.sku_cd = b.sku_cd

			left outer join

	        (select
	            j.equip_type, o.sku_cd, o.sku_nm, sum(o.order_qty) as order_qty
	        from
				job_batches j inner join orders o on j.id = o.batch_id
	        where
	            j.domain_id = :domain_id
				and j.job_type = 'DPS'
				and j.status = 'RUN'
				and o.order_type = 'MT'
		        #if($equip_type)
		        and o.equip_type = :equip_type
		        #end
		        #if($sku_cd)
		        and o.sku_cd like '%'||:sku_cd||'%'
		        #end
	        group by
	            j.equip_type, o.sku_cd, o.sku_nm) c
	            	            
	        on a.equip_type = c.equip_type and a.sku_cd = c.sku_cd
	) s
) stock
order by 
	stock.equip_type, stock.equip_cd, stock.need_stock_qty desc, stock.order_qty desc, stock.sku_cd

name: search-for-sku-barcode
description: 주문 및 작업 > 작업 현황 > 상품 바코드 조회
serviceLogic:
select 
	sku_barcd, sku_nm
from
	tb_sku
where
	#if($com_cd)
	com_cd = :com_cd and
	#end
	sku_cd = :sku_cd
